humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there are metastases carcinomatosae in 3 out of the 10 assessed axillary lymph nodes (No III/X). Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions 'Metastases carcinomatosae in lymphonodis (No III/X)' which means that 3 out of the 10 examined axillary lymph nodes contain cancer metastases. This corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N2.
